title: Software Developer - Josué Vázquez
description: Software Developer with expertise in backend development and intelligent systems based in Puebla, Mexico.

hero.title: Hello I'm Josué Vázquez!
hero.job_title: Software Developer with expertise in backend development and intelligent systems based in Puebla, Mexico
hero.description: Expert in Spring Boot, Node.js, Django and Java development.

jobs_description.title: OCR Tool Developer
jobs_description.description: During my social service, I developed an Optical Character Recognition (OCR) tool using Python. The system automated text extraction from document images, streamlining the processing of academic files. Additionally, I implemented data cleaning, reading error detection, and export to readable formats.

studies_description.title: Information Technology Engineering
studies_description.description: I am currently pursuing a degree in Information Technology Engineering at the Benemérita Universidad Autónoma de Puebla (BUAP), where I have acquired solid knowledge in web development, networks, databases, artificial intelligence and computer vision.
list: Fundamentals of artificial intelligence and machine learning
Computer security, network analysis and monitoring

studies_description.title: Web Backend Specialization - Oracle ONE Next Education G7
studies_description.description: I was selected as a student for the Oracle ONE Next Education program, an initiative in collaboration with Alura Latam, where I specialized in backend web development as part of group G. During this program I strengthened my skills in Java, databases and agile development best practices.
list: Backend development with Java and Spring Boot
Database management with MySQL and PostgreSQL
Consumption and design of RESTful APIs
Agile methodologies and version control with Git

projects.title: Collaborative Work Web App
projects.description: Team-developed web application using Django that enables citizens to create and manage civic proposals. Users can review existing proposals, create their own versions based on them, and vote for the best ones. The most voted proposal gets forwarded to relevant authorities for consideration.

projects.title: Digital Kiosk - User Management and Authentication
projects.description: Spring Boot microservices for user management in a digital content kiosk. Implements JWT authentication, subscription associations, account-type validations (customer, sponsor company, administrator), and registration of sponsored users.

projects.title: Decision Support System
projects.description: Python web application for decision-making assistance using decision trees and utility theory. Evaluates scenarios, assigns weights, calculates expected gains, and visualizes optimal courses of action based on defined criteria. This decision support system features dashboards aligned with nutritionists' mission and vision, utilizing patient gestation data collected via a mobile app, and applying business intelligence to solve medical challenges.

contributions.alt: OCR and NLP system for clinical support
contributions.title: OCR and NLP System for Clinical Decision Support
contributions.description: Contributed to developing an optical character recognition (OCR) system for processing medical documents related to breast cancer cases. Following text extraction, I designed and implemented a natural language processing (NLP) pipeline to interpret contents and generate JSON structures compatible with a Neo4j graph knowledge base. This database powers a clinical decision support system that suggests potential treatment options.

contributions.alt: AreWePlaying? - Web app for university matches
contributions.title: AreWePlaying? - Web App for University Match Announcements
contributions.description: Collaborated on developing *AreWePlaying?*, a web application designed for announcing university sports matches, including venue details, schedules, and other relevant information. The system enabled users to create accounts, manage preferences, and stay updated on upcoming matches. My primary focus was frontend development, working closely with backend teams to ensure high-quality integration.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: IT Student and Software Developer specializing in backend systems and intelligent solutions
about.description: I'm a Software Developer with over 2 years of experience, specializing in building robust backend systems, designing efficient APIs, and implementing intelligent solutions. My expertise includes developing microservices, collaborative applications, and decision support systems using Java, Python, Spring Boot, and occasionally frontend frameworks like React and Next.js. I have hands-on experience with NoSQL databases including Firebase and Neo4j graph knowledge bases. My infrastructure interests have led me to study networking, auditing, and monitoring systems, and I regularly apply Agile methodologies like Scrum for effective project management. With additional knowledge in operations research, I approach complex problems with logical, analytical thinking focused on optimization. I'm passionate about designing scalable, efficient solutions through critical technical analysis in software development.

certifications_title: Oracle ONE Next Education - Backend Web Specialization

certifications_description.title: Oracle ONE Next Education - Backend Web Specialization
certifications_description.description: Certification earned upon completing the backend web development specialization with Java and Spring Boot, managed by Oracle ONE Next Education.
list: Backend development with Java and Spring Boot
Consumption and design of RESTful APIs

certifications_description.title: Scrum CertiProf
certifications_description.description: Certification obtained by demonstrating knowledge of the Scrum agile methodology, awarded by CertiProf.
list: Roles and responsibilities in a Scrum team

certifications_description.title: Introduction to R
certifications_description.description: Certification earned upon completing the Introduction to R course, covering basic data analysis and visualization using the R language.

certifications_description.title: Cybersecurity
certifications_description.description: Certification earned upon completing a course on cybersecurity fundamentals, including key concepts in data protection and risk management.
